Message_List.From_String: Tom Early, MD and Samuel Skootsky, MD

Message.Subject: UCLA Specialists' Survey
Message.p: This is an invitation to the final part of a survey evaluating UCLA primary care physicians. This survey is your chance to acknowledge those who do a great job and to inform those who need improvement. You are among the specialists who have not responded to part 1 of the survey. We have now combined parts 1 and 2 of the survey together so that you can complete it all at once.

Please start the survey by clicking on the Web address below. Specialists who have already completed the survey commented that they enjoyed giving this feedback. The survey should take about 5 minutes, but may take more or less depending on how many physicians you decide to evaluate. If you have comments or questions, please contact Joann Damiani at jdamiani@mednet.ucla.edu.

Message.Subject: You have partially completed the evaluation of UCLA primary care physicians
Message.p: Thanks for beginning the online survey to evaluate the UCLA primary care physicians. Your answers so far have been saved.
Please remember to return and complete the survey. You can start again by clicking on the Web address below.

Message.Subject: Thank you for completing the UCLA Specialists' Survey
Message.p: Thank you for evaluating the UCLA primary care physicians. Your input is greatly appreciated!
If you have comments or questions, please contact Joann Damiani at jdamiani@mednet.ucla.edu.

Message.Subject: Please review the UCLA Specialists' Survey
Message.p: And see how the others have done so far.
